text: Gem and Jewelry Museum is a museum in Bangkok, Thailand operated by the Gem and Jewelry Institute of Thailand Public Organization, Faculty of Science, Chulalongkorn University. The displays include gems and mineral specimens, mining, the origins of gems and how they are cut and graded, precious metals and manufacturing procedures of gold, platinum and silver jewelries. ==References== ==External links== * Gem and Jewelry Museum - official site Category:Museums in Bangkok Category:University museums in Thailand Category:Geology museums in Thailand Category:Natural history museums in Thailand
title: Gem and Jewelry Museum
